00035 class MagnitudeLorentzian
00036 {
00037     public:
00038 
00039     // m(x) == 1/sqrt(ax^2 + bx + c)
00040     //      == alpha/sqrt(1/tau^2 + [2pi(x-center)]^2)
00041 
00042     MagnitudeLorentzian(double a, double b, double c);
00043     MagnitudeLorentzian(std::vector<double> a);
00044     MagnitudeLorentzian(const std::vector< std::pair<double,double> >& samples);
00045 
00046     double leastSquaresError() const;
00047 
00048     std::vector<double>& coefficients();
00049     const std::vector<double>& coefficients() const;
00050 
00051     double operator()(double x) const;
00052     double center() const;
00053     double tau() const;
00054     double alpha() const;
00055 
00056     private:
00057     std::vector<double> a_;
00058     double leastSquaresError_;
00059 };
